definition: carnivorous or bloodsucking aquatic or terrestrial worms typically having a sucker at each end, draw blood
details:
noun
- carnivorous or bloodsucking aquatic or terrestrial worms typically having a sucker at each end
= synonyms: bloodsucker
- a follower who hangs around a host (without benefit to the host) in hope of gain or advantage
= synonyms: parasite
verb
- draw blood
= synonyms: bleed, phlebotomize, phlebotomise
